subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Rangers are trailing Washington, three games to one, but since the 2011-12 season, they are 11-3 when on the verge of being ousted from the playoffs.
snippet: The Rangers are trailing Washington, three games to one, but since the 2011-12 season, they are 11-3 when on the verge of being ousted from the playoffs.
